video_prompt: A glossy, candy-apple red robotic elephant, accented with matte black and silver, strides left-to-right. Its segmented trunk articulates, glowing blue eye subtly shifts, and flaring ears articulate. Metallic surfaces reflect light as it moves against minimal dark background.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A glossy, candy-apple red robotic elephant with matte black and silver accents, in a powerful mid-stride pose. The 3D render features a blue glowing eye, articulated trunk with segmented rings, and creamy off-white tusks. Subtle sheen on the polished metallic finish. Dark, minimalist background.
refined_video_prompt: A robotic elephant powerfully strides left-to-right. Its segmented trunk fluidly articulates, while a glowing blue eye subtly shifts its focused gaze. Flaring ears dynamically adjust. Metallic surfaces continuously reflect and release light, creating an evolving play of highlights and shadows across its form with every movement.
